content: अकरणं [कृ-भावे ल्युट् न. त.] Not doing, absence of action; अकरणात् मंदकरणं श्रेयः; <ab>cf.</ab> the English phrases “Something is better than nothing,” “Better late than never”. --ण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Not artificial, natural. {@--2@} Devoid of all organs, epithet of the Supreme Spirit.
